title: Citadel Under Attack for SEC Comments on Crypto Rules
description: Citadel Securities wants American regulators to exercise caution when it comes to decentralized finance (DeFi). Writing to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) earlier this week as the agency considers how to apply securities laws to cryptocurren…
